channel.title: GAME~CHALLENGE: Find a NES game that doesnt suck ass in retrospect
channel.description:
It's dangerous to go alone take this: [url]https://virtualnes.com/index.html[/url] link your contenders.
Thisis still cool imo: [url]https://virtualnes.com/play/?id=NES-XR&s=9[/url]

item.title: GAME~CHALLENGE: Find a NES game that doesnt suck ass in retrospect
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
This one. pretty much all others really suck by now

Also, how is this website remotely legal? It’s giving you free access to commercial products that are still sold in the US.

WEBSITE REPORTED TO AUTHORITIES. AWAITING PRAISE.

item.title: GAME~CHALLENGE: Find a NES game that doesnt suck ass in retrospect
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
No. Think “bionic commando.” The player character is a bad ass robot cyborg warrior with a boomerang. You’re constantly fighting other robots and climbing up things.

Read full topic
item.source: GAME~CHALLENGE: Find a NES game that doesnt suck ass in retrospect

item.title: GAME~CHALLENGE: Find a NES game that doesnt suck ass in retrospect
item.dc:creator: Diabeetus
item.description:
The first console I owned was a Commodore Vic 20 (this makes me feel pretty old)
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commodore_VIC-20

When the Nintendo came out I remember every game rental was a gamble, so many games sucked. But the fun thing about it was that sucky or not, they were normally pretty tough and you did not want to waste the weekend not playing the only game you got to rent. If you had a brother or friend to play with that made it even better, Remember, these were the days before constant auto saves and difficulty settings. I never get that sense of fun frustration and difficulty in modern games.

Also, the game you may be remembering is “The Goonies 2” that game had cool music, robots I think and a boomerang that got snatched by flying cyborg heads.

Read full topic

item.title: GAME~CHALLENGE: Find a NES game that doesnt suck ass in retrospect
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Mega Man?
It’s in the future, you’re a robot kid, and you get a power up that’s kind of like a boomerang (it’s really scissors) after you beat CutMan.
Awesome game!

Read full topic
